subject: Missing item
description_text:
Hello

I am emailing regarding a missing item in my order, i received the simsonn
plus x pedals last week and im incredibly happy with them but after double
checking the order i ordered mine with 1 of the haptic reactors, this is
missing in the order. would it be possible to have one sent to me. my order
number is
#SSN2019

Many thanks Craig Winter

conversations.body_text: Hi Craig Winter,  Sorry, but the Haptic reactor comes with an optional purchase.  Â
